page.title: 04Community Spirit in Insch.
page.content: While the competitions were contin_ uing a number of side_shows were available.The Brownies ran a "Roll the Penny" stall and the Guides ran an "Aunt Sally".There was a lucky dip, a home baking stall,and refreshments were available too.Besides having horse back rides the children could enter their pets in the Pet Show. Continuing throughout the Gala week there was an interesting "Walking Treasure Hunt," with the clues based on the village. To complete the week's events the Gala Queen and her attendants,along with Grampian Television personality, Kennedy Thomson,sat down to a meal in a local hotel and afterwards danced the night away _ so ended a successful week for the community of Insch.
